example.text: Biden’s open border policies plus the end of Title 42 are a giant welcome sign for immigrants to enter our country illegally. According to reports, as many as 700,000 people are waiting in Mexico to cross when Title 42 ends this week. We need to secure the border NOW. [[url]]

At today's [[user]] hearing in Staten Island, I spotlighted why the US needs to engage in international trade to protect workers and secure our supply chains. The president can’t simply “go it alone” when it comes to trade. He needs to work with Congress. [[url]]

The slaughter of horses for consumption is a barbaric practice that has no place in America. Pleased to be leading the effort with [[user]] again to ban domestic horse slaughter and protect these majestic creatures. [[url]]

Prioritizing illegal immigrants over veterans who served our nation in uniform is downright disgraceful. We have a long way to go help our homeless veterans get back on their feet – this takes us in the opposite direction. [[url]]

Biden’s open border policies plus the end of Title 42 are a giant welcome sign for immigrants to enter our country illegally. According to reports, as many as 700,000 people are waiting in Mexico to cross when Title 42 ends this week. We need to secure the border NOW. [[url]]

At today's [[user]] hearing in Staten Island, I spotlighted why the US needs to engage in international trade to protect workers and secure our supply chains. The president can’t simply “go it alone” when it comes to trade. He needs to work with Congress. [[url]]

When even Biden admits the southern border will be “chaotic for a while,” you know it’s bad. That’s why this week [[user]] is voting to: ? ?Resume construction of the border wall ? ?Increase the number of CBP agents ? ?End catch and release The time for inaction is over.
